title: Nivash
description: A comprehensive real estate platform where users can browse, search, and find their dream properties. Features include property listings, detailed views, user authentication, and modern UI/UX design.
features: Role-based authentication (User, Member, Admin)
User authentication using Firebase (Email/Password based)
JWT token-based secure API communication (stored in client-side)
Apartment listing with search, filter, and pagination
Agreement request system with Accept/Reject functionality
Monthly rent payment with optional coupon support
Stripe and SSLCOMMERZ payment gateway integration
Admin dashboard with statistics and management options
Announcement management for users and members
Coupon management system (create, apply, expire)
Responsive and animated UI using Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion
Real-time status update of apartment availability
Form validation with React Hook Form
Clean, modular and scalable code structure

title: FoodBridge
description: A food sharing platform that connects food donors with people in need. Users can donate surplus food, browse available donations, and help reduce food waste while supporting the community.
features: Food listing with name, image, quantity, pickup location, and donor info
User authentication using Firebase (Email/Password based)
JWT token-based secure API communication (stored in client-side)
Request modal with non-editable food info and editable notes field
Food request submission with status update to 'unavailable'
MongoDB integration with native driver for database operations
Real-time food availability status update
Animated and responsive UI
Success and error toast notifications for user actions

title: PlantPal
description: A comprehensive plant care and gardening platform that helps users manage their plants, track care schedules, and learn about plant cultivation. Features include plant identification, care reminders, and a community for plant enthusiasts.
features: Plant identification system
Care schedule tracking
Plant care reminders
Community features
Plant database
User authentication using Firebase (Email/Password based)
Responsive design
